<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>71720</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111966</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111966</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111966</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ulomki - uvod</string>
            <string language="en">Fractions - introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brüche - Einleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractions - introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frações - introdução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frazioni - introduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη - εισαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fracciones - introducción</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Excelova preglednica z različnimi nalogami za usvajanje in utrjevanje znanja o ulomkih, ki nudi takojšnjo povratno informacijo ter pojasnila v primeru napačnega reševanja. Učitelj preglednico lahko naloži na razredni računalnik. Uporabi možnost Pogled -> Celoten zaslon. Varnostna nastavitev za makre mora biti nizka. Makri morajo biti omogočeni.</string>
            <string language="en">Excel spreadsheet that contains different exercises to present fractions (part of the whole, denominator, reducing, graphical representation, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ulomek</string>
            <string language="en">fraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">krajšanje</string>
            <string language="en">reducing fraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">imenovalec</string>
            <string language="en">denominator</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertreffen Sie Kalkulationstabelle, die 
unterschiedliche Übungen enthält, um Brüche (Teil der des Nenners, 
des Verringerns, graphischen Darstellung des Ganzen...) darzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Excelez le tableur qui contient différents 
exercices pour présenter les fractions (une partie de la 
représentation de totalité, de dénominateur, réducteur, 
graphique...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excel o spreadsheet que contem exercícios 
diferentes para apresentar as frações (parte da respresentação do 
todo, do denominador, se reduzir, a gráfica...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eccella il foglio elettronico che contiene le 
esercitazioni differenti per presentare le frazioni (parte della 
rappresentazione di riduzione e grafica di tutto, di 
denominatore...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογισμός με λογιστικό φύλλο (spreadsheet) 
Excel που περιέχει τις διαφορετικές ασκήσεις για να παρουσιάσει
τα μέρη (μέρος του συνόλου, παρονομαστής, μείωση, γραφική 
αντιπροσώπευση...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sobresalga la hoja de balance que contiene 
diversos ejercicios para presentar las fracciones (parte de la 
representación del conjunto, del denominador, de la reducción, 
gráfica...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bruch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verringern des Bruches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nenner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réduction de la fraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dénominateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reduzindo a fração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">denominador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">frazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riduzione della frazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">denominatore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μείωση του μέρους</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρονομαστής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reducción de la fracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">denominador</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
